lines.i: Causes of delay to the transport process

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.156"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10605)/@code="67559-5" Transport delay NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10604)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10607), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.53 STATIC (CONF:10606)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.11
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10605)/@code="67559-5" Transport delay NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10604)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10607), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.53 STATIC (CONF:10606)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.11
